Open FTK Imager.  
Create Disk Image from the Files menu.  
Select Physical Drive and click Next.  
Choose the storage device and click Finish.  
Tick checkboxes and click Add.  
Select Image Type as Raw (dd) and click Next.  
Enter Evidence Information.  
Select Image Destination, browse the folder, and name the file.  
Click Finish and then Start to begin imaging.  
Wait for the process to complete and verify data integrity.  
Check the destination folder for the created image file.  
(Optional) Click Summary to view the forensic imaging report.
